content: Does anyone know of a reference that contains results about Top and related categories. For example, I'm looking for results about the forgetful functors OrdTop -> Top, G-Top -> Top, G-Top -> G-Set, TopGrp -> Top, G-OrdTop -> G-Top, etc.
Maybe Abstract and Concrete Categories - The Joy of Cats is somewhat relevant?
Yes. Unfortunately, they only talk about TopGrp -> Top a little. There is no mention of any of the other functors.
